item.title: Another Problem ! Help!
item.dc:creator: @DaRtHeR DaRtHeR
item.description:
@DaRtHeR wrote:

Hi, As you may know i’m working on my portal that gives you magic exp. But at the moment it has 1 last error.

I’ve got this …

sendMessage("You jump into the portal, You feel different !"); { if (playerLevel[6] <= 1 == false) addSkillXP(0, 6); sendMessage("You jump into the portal, But nothing happens !");

It’s got more on top, But i’m not showing yet.

Well when i go onto my server. It tells me both of them send messages but i don’t want it to.

The top is if playerlevel 6 == 1 == true etc.

Can anyone help ?

Thanks

Darther
